ComicInfo.Summary:
The Duckman Detective Agency is hired by Mob Frog ("Uncontested leader of the twelve families. You've held this city in a grip of terror for decades. You've also sired over four hundred children, all of them killing machines") to make sure his nephew Antwerp survives the weekend. Shortly before the deadline, however, Antwerp is hit in the head with an anvil and ends up in a coma. Duckman fails to cover up this mishap, and for unexplained reasons Antwerp ends up on national television because of his engagement to Grandma-ma.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/duckman-the-mob-frog-saga-1-dead-duck/4000-110257/

ComicInfo.Title: The Mob Frog Saga Part 1: Dead Duck
